title: List things Riot has done you don't agree with
body:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/FcA2AEwy-i-dont-see-much-on-the-side-of-people-defending-riot

^ Positive version of this thread, post in there too if ya got stuff.

No rage-fest plz, and keep it to stuff done within this year preferably.
